item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Wasting Inferences with Aider (21 points | 10 comments)

24. A Farewell to the ArcoLinux University (67 points | 11 comments)
